Class BaseService

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.ws.rs.core.Application
      • org.glassfish.jersey.server.ResourceConfig
        • com.cigital.insecurepay.service.Logging
          • com.cigital.insecurepay.service.BaseService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.ws.rs.core.Configurable<org.glassfish.jersey.server.ResourceConfig>, javax.ws.rs.core.Configuration, org.glassfish.jersey.ExtendedConfig, org.glassfish.jersey.server.ServerConfig
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AccountNumValidationService, AccountService, ActivityHistoryService, ChangePasswordService, ChatService, CustomerService, ForgotPasswordService, LoginService, LogoutService, TransferFundsService, TransferValidationService

    public class BaseService
extends Logging
    BaseService is a parent class that is extended by all Services. It contains the common variable and methods that can be used to establish a connection with the database server.
